param.name: theme
param.label: Primary Theme
param.description: Select the primary theme. If no theme is selected, the core theme will be used.

param.name: theme_mobile
param.label: Primary Mobile Theme
param.description: Select the primary mobile theme. This is the theme that will be loaded on mobile devices. If no theme is selected, the mobilecore theme will be used. If that theme does not exist, the core theme will be used.

param.name: compress_css
param.label: Compress CSS
param.description: Choose whether or not you would like to combine your template CSS files with gzip compression.

param.name: compress_js
param.label: Compress Javascript
param.description: Choose whether or not you would like to combine your template javascript files with gzip compression.

param.name: plugins
param.label: Enable Plugins
param.description: Choose whether or not you would like to enable custom Motif plugins to load.

param.name: debug
param.label: Debug Mode
param.description: Select whether or not the template should display in debug mode. If the template is in debug mode, you can add debug=1 to the URL to see where various files are loaded from your theme.

param.name: tp
param.label: Enable tp=1 functionality
param.description: Select whether or not you would like to allow adding tp=1 to URL's to display your template's module positions.

param.name: manual_theme
param.label: Enable theme=THEME_NAME functionality
param.description: Select whether or not you would like to allow adding zt=THEME_NAME to URL's to manually override which theme is loaded.
